channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Biden administration gave TSMC billions to build its semiconductors in the U.S., but Trump says he threatened 100% tariffs and got the company to double down

Apr 10: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: More market volatility expected after surprise tariff pause; Hero dog touring U.S. to raise awareness for animal abuse.

item.title: China to limit number of American films imported from US amid tariff battle
item.description: China announced its decision to reduce the number of U.S. films shown in China amid the escalating trade war between the nations.

item.title: This federal rule helped clear air over America’s most beloved parks. Trump’s EPA wants to kill it
The 2025 Masters is underway. Here's everything you need to know.
item.description: Scottie Scheffler, Rory McIlroy and the rest of golf's best players have gathered again at Augusta National for the Masters.

item.title: At least 218 dead, including former MLB pitcher, in roof collapse at nightclub
item.description: At least 218 people were killed and over 150 injured at the Jet Set nightclub in the capital of Santo Domingo, officials said.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to meet with his Cabinet after tariff shake-up
item.description: Though Trump paused tariffs on many countries, tensions between the U.S. and China, the two largest economies, only escalated after Trump raised them ...

item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: EU pauses retaliatory measures after Trump backs off
item.description: In a dramatic move Wednesday, Trump authorized a 90-day pause in the higher tariffs for most countries he announced last week while maintaining a 10% ...

item.title: Trump’s new energy order puts states’ climate laws in the crosshairs of the Department of Justice
Education Department withdraws from plan to address discipline disparities for Native students
item.description: The Education Department has withdrawn from an agreement to address disparities in discipline for Native American students at a South Dakota school sy...

item.title: Trump's immigration tactics obstruct efforts to avert bird flu pandemic: Researchers
item.description: Immigration raids and threats have undermined efforts to prevent and detect bird flu infections among farmworkers, researchers say.

item.title: Senate daylight saving time hearing: "Stuck with this since World War I"
item.description: President Trump suggested in December that he supported eliminating daylight saving time.

item.title: House GOP adopts Trump budget plan after conservatives fold
item.description: The vote was initially delayed amid conservatives' concerns about the level of spending cuts.
